I am very satisfied with the visit. The doctor was very empathetic, explained in detail what, how, and why. On the spot, in the office, he performed a minor procedure that immediately brought relief, for which we are very grateful. The office is clean, well-equipped, and has a pleasant atmosphere. I highly recommend and am very happy that I ended up with Dr. Jan Kowalski.

This was my first visit to Dr. Jan Kowalski. It took place on time, in a pleasant and friendly atmosphere. I was able to present my problem in detail and received precise and thorough answers. I will definitely return to Dr. Jan Kowalski if needed.

I had a visit with Dr. Jan Kowalski and I am very satisfied. The doctor examined me thoroughly, patiently listened to my symptoms, and explained further steps. The visit took place in a calm atmosphere, without rush. I felt cared for and treated with respect. I definitely recommend, especially if someone is looking for a reliable and empathetic specialist.

I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Jan, primarily for professional care, empathy, and great involvement. I came to the office with a persistent ENT problem that I had been struggling with for a long time, and thanks to an accurate diagnosis and effective treatment, I finally regained my quality of life. The doctor explains everything thoroughly, listens to the patient, and approaches treatment with great care. It's clear that this is a person with a calling – full of kindness and warmth. I sincerely recommend to anyone looking for a good ENT specialist in Poznań!
Full professionalism from Dr. Jan. Detailed interview, substantive explanations. A doctor full of empathy, patience. Listens to the patient. I recommend :)
Substantive explanations, quick help, and a friendly atmosphere.
